title: 4. You want to migrate a public NodeJS application, which serves requests over HTTPS, from your on-premises data centre to Google Cloud Platform. You plan to host it on a fleet of instances behind Managed Instances Group (MIG) in Google Compute Engine. You need to configure a GCP load balancer to terminate SSL session before passing traffic to the VMs. Which GCP Load balancer should you use?
alternatives: A. Use External SSL proxy load balancer.
C. Use Internal TCP load balancer.
D. Use External TCP proxy load balancer.
